name: Intro
_source: s;Juliet;Quiet. We may not be welcome here anymore.
s;Simon;W-wait for the rest of us!|Should we prepare for combat?
s;Juliet;Don't you dare draw your blade.|Not until Vincent and I investigate.
s;Vincent;We should visit your home first, Juliet.|I don't want to venture to mine unless...
s;Juliet;I know. Let's watch for a trap.
s;Vincent;Follow us, milord.{w} But keep a distance.
# Juliet/Vincent go into house. Vincent's parents were exiled by the village
# so as to not attract the attention of the New Dawn (they would be considered
# collaborators since their son is a knight)
# Juliet's sister Tirago is the town guard, but was recently injured
# Simon is introduced, Tirago gives him a hard time but Vincent/Juliet step in
# New Dawn attacks. If Percy's been defeated, Tirago explains that they're
# basically just bandits now. If he's still alive, she says they're looking
# for collaborators, and will likely raze the village.
s;Juliet;Easy sis, it's the two of us.
s;Tirago;I hadn't heard anything, and thought...|Ah, thank the Fates!
s;Juliet;Have you been safe?{w} We had to flee the demense,|but we wanted to check on you and Vincent's parents.
s;Vincent;Yes, I'm sorry to interrupt, but are they safe?
s;Tirago;I... wish I could tell you.{w} They were exiled a few weeks ago.
s;Vincent;Exiled! Why?{w} They've lived here their whole lives!
s;Tirago;Because the New Dawn are bandits, now!{w} Since Lord Verstadt took the castle,|they've begun looting villages they think will collaborate.
s;Vincent;Collaborate? Lord Verstadt has brought peace!|They could lay down their arms, yet keep fighting?
s;Tirago;I can't understand it either.|But your parents were collaborators with the Tyrant,|and the village thought-
s;Vincent;That collaboration brought us peace during Simon's father's reign!|No one spoke against my family then!
s;Tirago;I know! I know, I told them that!{w} But be quiet, please!|It's midnight, and I'm not sure anyone is looking to see you.
s;Tirago;They were collaborators with the Verstadts!|The other villagers were terrified the New Dawn would learn of it.
s;Vincent;That collaboration brought us peace during his father's reign!|No one spoke against my family then!
s;Tirago;I know! I know, I told them that!{w} But be quiet, please!|It's midnight, and I'm not sure anyone is looking to see you.
s;Juliet;Vincent, please, quiet!{w} It's only been a few weeks.|I'm sure they're safe,{w} maybe even in Morrissey territory.
s;Juliet;Sis, come with us.{w} There's no reason to stay.
s;Tirago;Aye, truth to that.{w} I caught a blow in a raid,|and I haven't been walking straight since.|I'm not much of a town guard anymore.
s;Tirago;I'll grab it and we go.|Though... where to?|Morrissey?
s;Vincent;We have to tell her, Juliet.|We should do it now.|Lord Verstadt, please enter.
s;Vincent;Milord, this is Tirago, Juliet's sister.
s;Vincent;It may be a good time to-
s;Tirago;Why would you bring him here?|Juliet.|Why did you bring him here?
s;Juliet;We fight with him now. Willingly.|He isn't like his father.
s;Tirago;I can't even look at him.|{c:wait;1000}Tell him to get out of my home.
s;Vincent;Milord, it may be best if-
s;Tirago;Juliet, Juliet, what are you doing?|He... his family caused this!|I don't adore the New Dawn,{w} but he caused them!|And you fight with him?
s;Vincent;He has shown me more loyalty and care than this village ever has.|He traveled with us so we would not venture alone,|and traveled into enemy territory!
